CustomField.description: Stores the Consignment Id to preserve the relationship/association data in the event of article archiving (every 6 months). This field is updated via automation when an article/consignment value is populated.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Stores the Consignment Id to preserve the relationship/association data in the event of article archiving (every 6 months). This field is updated via automation when an article/consignment value is populated.
CustomField.label: Consignment Id
